Text: Stockton raised £608,000 from this last year with the help of a bumper 4.1% interest rate - and councillors were told the sum was pumped back into front-line services.
Cause: a bumper 4.1% interest rate - and councillors were told the sum was pumped back into front-line services.
Effect: Stockton raised £608,000 from this last year
